note: I'm an astronomer at the National Radio Astronomy Observatory, posting on a personal basis. All opinions are mine. I have previously worked for USRA at SOFIA and Arecibo Observatory, for Cornell University at Arecibo Observatory, and for Cardiff University. I did an MSci in physics at Durham University and a PhD in astronomy at Cardiff University. I'm also a Christian and attend an Episcopal church. My pronouns are he/him.
